Html:
Is anyone else having an issue with the filters not actually filtering the possible gear choices?

I am trying to build an upgrade list for one of my new toons. (which means I want to look at all gear out of heroic dungeons & triumph, valor, conquest, heroism rewards)

the problem I'm having is that when i update the item filter, none of the actual items change.  I used a previous version of rawr to make sure it was the program malfunctioning, I used version 2.2.27 (the first version I had ever downloaded) Any thoughts? Soon this toon will have all the gear needed from these heroics, and from right now I can only guess what I need from the ICC 5-man heroic and normal dungeons.
Do the items not being filtered not have source data? Eg- Does their source line (at the bottom of the tooltip) state 'Unknown, Refresh from Armory' or similar?

Odd, as I was replying to this thread it fixed itself, after having this problem for the past few weeks..

wish I could tell you what went wrong there =/ sry for wasting your time lol
